short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you see the right schedule for BYU.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is still in early development, I appreciate your patience while we work to make it as error-free and user friendly as possible.

Designed for BYU Students looking to plan what sections to take. Adds a button to the "Register" tab of BYU's MyMap for each planned course where you can view the offerings and select rows to view on the new "Planning Calendar".

BYU Schedule Helper lets you view section info for all your upcoming classes in one window and gives a preview calendar of selected sections.
